page.title: 09HOUSING:AMENITIES
page.content: On the{22nd May}Bobbie Smith and myself Nicola Lowe went out to Newbold and went to three peoples houses and asked people who we knew. We went and asked them some{questionaires.}All of the people had {telephones.}All of the people had got a {garage}and a{garden. None of the people had an{open fire.} All of the people lived in a{semi {detached.}All of the people had toilets{upstairs.}All the people we interviewed lived on the main road except for one lady who lived up Brownsover road. None of the people had an attic and none of the people had a cellar. All of the people had electricity and all of the people had gas. Most of the people we interviewed lived in medium sized houses.
